roleset.name: guess
roleset.note: ESTIMATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'estimate' based on survey of initial sentences from big corpus (from estimate.01-v predicate notes)
ESTIMATE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry estimate.01, maps to VN class estimate-34.2, price-54.4. (from estimate.01-n)

ESTIMATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on sentences in Temprel data. Comparison to estimate-n and estimate-v. Estimate-v is a member of VN classestimate-34.2 and price-54.4. Framed by Katie. (from estimation.01-n)

example.name: transitive, arg1 as sentence
example.text: The department previously estimated that durable-goods orders fell 0.1%

example.name: passivized with arg2
example.text: [Johnson& Johnson's profits from Retin-A]-1 are estimated *trace*-1 at $50 million.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: He-1 declined *-1 to make a specific earnings estimate .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Goldman's estimate for operating margins is 27%, leading to their earnings estimate of 22c.
